name: Quick Snares
summary: You can rig a snare in only moments.
description:
You can rig a snare in only moments. You can Craft snares that normally take 1 minute to Craft with 3 Interact actions, even if you havenâ€™t prepared them.Archetype Use

This feat can be used for one or more Archetypes in addition to the listed Classes. When selected this way, the feat is not considered to have its class traits.Quick Snares Leads To...Lightning Snares
